summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Lead Quality Engine MVP. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with minor clipboard and HTML structure issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Copy buttons fail with 'Write permission denied' error
ui_bugs.details: Browser security prevents clipboard access, need to implement fallback or proper permissions

design_issues.issue: HTML nesting violation: p tags inside p tags causing hydration errors
design_issues.details: Console shows 'p cannot contain nested p' warnings

passed_tests: CSV upload functionality with sample_leads.csv (20 leads)
Lead table display with proper score-based sorting
Lead details sheet opening and navigation
AI message generation (WhatsApp, Email, Call script) using OpenAI GPT-5.2
Best time of day calculation and display (Morning 9 AM - 12 PM)
Page loading and main UI components
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard copy functionality by implementing proper browser permissions or fallback method. Address HTML nesting issues in SheetDescription component.

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (9/10 major features working, clipboard issue only)
